detail_desc: Jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Hi-top trainers in canvas with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves, a visible zip down the back and a seam under the bust. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long puff sleeves.
Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening. Ties at one side and 3/4-length sleeves with a frill trim.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Trousers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Fitted top in soft, airy jersey made from a stretch cotton blend with long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a gently flared, rounded hem.
Earrings in metal decorated with rhinestones in glass and plastic. Length 2 cm and 8.5 cm.
Metal earrings in various sizes decorated with beads and pendants in metal and plastic. Five pairs of hoop earrings and two pairs of longer earrings with hoop pendants. Length 2.2 cm to 5 cm.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.

prod_name: 2 pk Dad & Kid polka dot OL
detail_desc: Set of two pairs of socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. One pair in an adult size (6.5-10.5) and one pair in a child size.
Gently flared top in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and decorative gathers at the neckline and short, elasticated raglan sleeves.
Small leather shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap and a flap with a decorative metal catch and concealed magnetic fastener. One inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 2.5x10x17 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend in a relaxed fit with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Rigid clutch bag in a jute and cotton weave with a metal rim around the opening, a snap lock and narrow chain shoulder strap. Twill lining with elastic along the short side. Size 6x10x16 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes, decorated with sparkly stones. Diameter from 1 cm to 2 cm.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Cotton jersey vest top with a print motif on the front.

Set with a top and skirt in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with an all-over print, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a ribbed hem. Skirt with an all-over print and elastication at the waist. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Jumper in a soft wool knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cashmere content of the jumper is recycled. The wool content is partly recycled.
Short, A-line dress woven in a viscose blend with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation suede with covered block heels, crossover foot straps and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Ankle-length chinos in sturdy cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Front pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Short wrap dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short sleeves. Ties at the waist and a flounce around the neckline, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.
Lace suspender belt for holding up nylon stockings. Covered elastication at the top with an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slip-on trainers in cotton twill with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Long, lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a faux fur-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Drawstring at the waist, side pockets with a button, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Quilted lining.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front.

Dress shirt in a cotton weave with a cutaway collar and bib French front with pin-tucks. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with quilted sections on the shoulders. Small stand-up collar with an adjustable tab and press-stud, and a zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.

Jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with reflective details, a zip down the front with a chin guard, open side pockets, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Padded at the front and back.
Pyjamas in supersoft jersey. Top with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
Metal chain bracelet with a clasp.
Belly bands in soft viscose jersey that provide a comfortable feeling over the tummy and hide the gap between your top and trousers.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jumper in a soft textured knit with a cable-knit section at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with scalloped ribbing at the cuffs. Ribbing at the neckline and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in soft, brushed jersey with a small stand-up collar, long, wide raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with inset lace sections, rounded, double shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared lower section.
Hat, mittens and tube scarf set in a soft jacquard knit. Hat with earflaps, a pompom on top and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Tube-scarf with ribbed edges.
Long, fitted jersey top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Imitation leather boots with a padded top edge, zip at the side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Decorative welt seam around the soles, mesh linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges, a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Skater skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section, round toes and covered block heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
Thin metal chain necklace with a decorative metal ring. Adjustable length, approx. 52-59 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and a skirt with straps in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a rounded collar and press-studs at the back of the neck and crotch. Picot trim around the collar and cuffs. Skirt with covered elastication at the waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable buttoning.
Shirt in an organic cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined V-neck swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps attached to a decorative metal ring at the back. Low-cut back and high-cut legs.

Suit trousers in a textured stretch weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Sandals with open sides and toes and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles.
Twelve pairs of metal studs and two pairs of metal earrings in various sizes and designs, some with pendants.

Blouse in a crisp cotton weave with double-layered, voluminous puff sleeves that have pleats on the shoulders and elastication around the hems. Stand-up collar and a visible zip with a long tab at the back of the neck.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft modal and cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted nightdress in soft jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and a chest pocket. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Press-studs on one shoulder.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
Baseball shirt in soft jersey with 3/4-length raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a rounded hem.
Thong briefs in jersey with a high waist and lined gusset. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the tummy.
Set with a hat, scarf and gloves in a soft fine knit. Double-layered hat with a small appliqué on the upturned edge. Gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Thong briefs in organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Boots in imitation leather with an imitation suede shaft and an adjustable tab with a metal buckle at the top and over the foot. Fleece linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
